I think it is really cool to use my art to communicate with people.
I'm clumsy, but I don't let it stop me from living my life.
i am a business man.

participant_2.background:
I love peaches! They are my favorite fruit.
i like books about trains.
I like to take drives in my classic car and listen to the engine rumble.
I love to spend my free time practicing bird calls and learning more about them.
I love fresh seafood and vegetables from the Pacific Northwest.

content.text: I'm doing great, thank you for asking! What about you?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking!
That's good to hear! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to read, take drives in my classic car, and practice bird calls.
That's really interesting! I love to read as well, but I'm not very good at bird calls.
It's definitely a skill that takes practice! Do you have any favorite books?
I love books about history and art, but I also enjoy reading anything that's well-written.
I love historical fiction, and I'm also a big fan of biographies.
Those are great genres! I'm always looking for new books to read.
Me too! I love going to the library and browsing the shelves.
I do too! I love the feeling of finding a new book that I'm excited to read.
Me too! It's the best feeling.
